#include<iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stack>
#include<limits.h>
#include<string.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#define scan(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define print(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
/*bool IsPrime(int number)
{	// Given:   num an integer > 1
	// Returns: true if num is prime
	// 			false otherwise.

	int i;
	if(number==1)
	return false;
	for (i=2; i<number; i++)
	{
		if (number % i == 0)
		{
			return false;
		}
	}

	return true;
}*/
int main(){
	long long int n,i;
	while(1){
		long long int sum=0,x,y;
		scan(n);
		if(n==0)
		break;
		//Add all digits which are prime of the num given
		while(n>0){
			x=n%10;
		//	if(IsPrime(x))
  if(x==2||x==3||x==5||x==7)
  			sum+=x;
			n=n/10;
		}
		while(sum>=10){
			 y=sum;
			sum=0;
			while(y>0){
				sum+=y%10;
   				y=y/10;
			}
		}
		print(sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
